name: strFileCfg
description: full location of the configuration file

name: idxUnitX
description: index of the current unit in 1st dimension

name: idxUnitY
description: index of the current unit in 2nd dimension

name: strFileInp
description: full location of the input file

name: strFileOut
description: full location of the output file

name: numFrame
description: number of the frames to be processed

name: enmProc
description: enumerator for processing behavior (<value> 0: software 1: hardware)

name: enmInfo
description: enumerator for information level (<value> 0: none 1: system 2: top 3: module 4: common)

name: enmLoad
description: enumerator for load source (<value> 0: pipeline 1: file 2: random)

name: addEnmLoad
description: enumerator for load source (<value> 0: pipeline 1: file 2: random)

name: addEnmDump
description: enumerator for data dump (<value> 0: none 1: inout 2: intermediate)

name: subEnmLoad
description: enumerator for load source (<value> 0: pipeline 1: file 2: random)

name: subEnmDump
description: enumerator for data dump (<value> 0: none 1: inout 2: intermediate)

name: mulEnmLoad
description: enumerator for load source (<value> 0: pipeline 1: file 2: random)

name: mulEnmDump
description: enumerator for data dump (<value> 0: none 1: inout 2: intermediate)

name: divEnmLoad
description: enumerator for load source (<value> 0: pipeline 1: file 2: random)

name: divEnmDump
description: enumerator for data dump (<value> 0: none 1: inout 2: intermediate)
